All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    AddGradeScreen
    This class holds the components of the add grade screen giving the user the ability to add the desired grades to the main GPA table.
    Calculations
    This class holds the methods which will be used to do the basic calculations such as calculate final grades and GPA, implements the ICalcGPA interface
    CourseDetails
    This class is used to hold the values of every course with ease
    DBActionsException
    This is the exception class for the project handles projects thrown exceptions most of the exceptions thrown are SQL based exceptions.
    DBconnection
    This class is a Singleton pattern and is in charge of the connection to the DB it's only method is used throughout every action which interacts with the DB and get the connection
    ICalcGPA
    This interface is intended to make it easier for us to get an object that his solely purpose is to calculate the grades for us from inside the DB
    IDBSimpleActions
    IDBSimpleActions interface in an extension for ISimpleActions interface and is adding up upon it another functions to get all the courses table from the database or a specific course
    IFindNewGPA
    IFindNewGPA interface in an extension for ISimpleActions interface and is adding up upon it another function to handle a new GPA calculation based on an imaginary grade
    ISimpleActions
    ISimpleActions interface is used to perform simple actions such as addGrade, deleteGrade or editGrade
    IViewSimpleActions
    IViewSimpleActions interface in an extension for ISimpleActions interface and is adding up upon it another functions to update the course table and the GPA label within the user UI
    Model
    This class holds the methods which will be interacting with the DB giving the program the ability to retrieve/update information in the DB and do the "heavy" work
    TableHomeFrame
    This class holds the components of the main screen hence providing the interaction between the user and the application.
    View  
    ViewModel
    in charge of communication between the methods in the view and the methods in the model
